Name: The Knight of Turn
About the game: Knight of Turn is a board game where the brave knight, imprisoned by the monsters in the deep dungeon, must find freedom and free the kingdom from this threat. A Turn Based Game Over 60 Challenging puzzles that put your skills to the test Different types of items to defeat enemies like swords, shields, bows... Different ways of completing each level
